title: How to Make Shredded Meat in Chili Sauce

steps.headline: Cut the pork fillet into strips.
Add 1 tsp cooking wine, a little salt, starch, and water and marinate for 10 minutes.
Julienne the winter bamboo and fungus.
Mince the green onion, fresh garlic, and ginger.
Make the fish sauce.
steps.description: Use 3 tsp sugar, 2 tsp vinegar, 1 tsp light soy sauce, 1 tsp cooking wine, 1/2 tsp starch, and 3 tbsp water to make the marinade.

steps.headline: Put the shredded meat in the hot oil.
steps.description: Then, dry it and take it out.

steps.headline: Pour a little oil in a pot, put the minced peppers in it and stir fry until the oil becomes red.
Add onion, ginger, and garlic and sautee the ingredients until they are fragrant.
Add the winter bamboo and fungus.
Pour the fish sauce over the shredded meat.

text: Preparing the Ingredients Cut the pork fillet into strips.  Add 1 tsp cooking wine, a little salt, starch, and water and marinate for 10 minutes.  Julienne the winter bamboo and fungus.  Mince the chili pepper.  Mince the green onion, fresh garlic, and ginger.  Make the fish sauce. Use 3 tsp sugar, 2 tsp vinegar, 1 tsp light soy sauce, 1 tsp cooking wine, 1/2 tsp starch, and 3 tbsp water to make the marinade. Cooking the Ingredients Put the shredded meat in the hot oil. Then, dry it and take it out. Pour a little oil in a pot, put the minced peppers in it and stir fry until the oil becomes red.  Add onion, ginger, and garlic and sautee the ingredients until they are fragrant.  Add the winter bamboo and fungus.  Pour the fish sauce over the shredded meat.  Serve.
